description: The Caipirinha is probably one of the most popular and one of the&nbsp;best cocktails. Its main ingredient is the cachaca and although it is not technically a type of rum, it is still considered one, especially by Brazilian people.It is a classic favorite by many rum aficionados, with its simple ingredients such as cachaca, muddle lime, and sugar. The recipe is also very flexible and is open for you to use any of your favorite fruits.
name: Caipirinha
